flavor: You were a member of the Paper Nest, a clandestine society of advisors and confidants to the sorcerer-queen. Taking their name from the pulpy nests of wasps, group members create the paper used by Lalali-Puy and her scribes, while also secretly convening to advise the sorcerer-queen on matters regarding Gulg. Do you still serve the Oba, and if so, what is your mission? Have you ended your service, and if so, why did you leave?
name: Gulg - Paper Wasp
